ossj.qos.fmri
Class AttributeValueChangeImpl

java.lang.Object
  ossj.qos.fmri.AttributeValueChangeImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.oss.fm.monitor.AttributeValueChange, java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable
public class AttributeValueChangeImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.oss.fm.monitor.AttributeValueChange

AttributeValueChangeImpl Represents changed attribute value including both old and new value. It is used in a changed alarm event to report changed attribute value.

Version:
1.0 ? Copyright 2001-2002, MOTOROLA INC. All Rights Reserved
Author:
Audrey Ward
